TextView.android:text: Since it is an overseas product, it is important to measure the dimensions correctly in order to order the right size for your body.
To select the correct dimensions, check the measurement points of each item and compare the dimensions of the same area.

Dimensions shown in size chart are based on nude size. When measuring the size, it is better to let other people measure. When measuring the size with a tape measure, do not over tighten. Please measure the dimensions as accurately as possible.It is not as roughly as possible.

A. Chest / Bust: Horizontal measurement across the scapula from the top bust
B. Waist: Measures the waistline directly above the radius
C. Hips: Measure horizontally through the widest convex around the waist
D. Neck circumference (Neck): The upper part of the feather passes through the vocal cords and is detected by a tape measure but with a margin of measurement. E. Overarm: Measure to the outermost part of both shoulders
F. Skirt Length: measured straight down from the waist
G. Height: Take off your shoes and measure straight from the tip of your head to your heel
H. Arm Length: Place your hands on the hips, elbow angle of 90 degrees, and measure from shoulder to elbow to wrist
I. Outseam: Measure from waist to ankle
J. Inseam: Measures to the length of pants you want from the inside of your thigh to the back of your feet
